greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! So nice to see you again. <es name='affection_05' /> Looking at you reminds me it's dance time! <es name='dance_disco_00' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> It's your robot </es>. We are ready to go play together in the playground this time!<es name='Emoji_Sun' />

all: Oh no, it looks like someone hid all the flags in a secret place, and we need to find them. <es cat='sad' />
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different flags here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different flags here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many flags there are in the playground?</es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different <prize-name>s here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many flags there are in the playground?</es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different <prize-name>s here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.

all: We found so many <prize-name>s! <es name = 'affection_01'/> Way to go, <participant-name>! <es name='SpinHead_01' />
<es name='Yawn_01' /> Okay, I feel very tired after digging up those flags from the playground. Nap time, it is. <break size='1.0' /> Chao!

question0: <es cat='question'/>I wonder if there are bugs underneath the rocks.
question1: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder who makes all these flags?
question2: <es cat='question'/>I wonder what flags are made of?
question3: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder why I have one big eye, instead of two eyes like yours. <break size='0.5'/>triangle? <break size='0.5'/>or square?
question4: <es cat='question'/>I wonder if it's allowed to pick the flowers.
question5: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder if robots can climb the ladder too.

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'> By the way, I wonder where the world's first ever flag was made.</es>
